org.agilewiki.jactor2.core

Class ActorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.ActorBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FactoriesImporter, HelloService, JAContextActivator, JASemaphore, JAServiceTracker, Publisher

    public class ActorBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor

    ActorBase is a convenience class that implements an Actor. Initialization is not thread-safe, so it should be done before a reference to the actor is shared.

    Sample Usage:

     public class ActorBaseSample extends ActorBase {
     public ActorBaseSample(final MessageProcessor _processor) throws Exception {
         initialize(_processor);
     }
 }

      • initialize

        public void initialize(MessageProcessor _messageProcessor)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize an actor. This method can only be called once without raising an illegal state exception, as the message processor can not be changed.
        Parameters:
        _messageProcessor - The actor's message processor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
